Headline.Para: Paid Notice: Memorials; WORTMAN, ROBERT ("BOB") BELOVED HUSBAND OF BARBARA, FATHER OF MELISSA (JOE) AND ALLISON, GRANDFATHER OF HAZEL, SON OF RUTH AND THE LATE MELVIN, SON, IN, LAW OF HARRIET AND THE LATE HERB, BROTHER OF JERRY (LAURIE) AND ANITA, AND BROTHER, IN, LAW OF SUSAN PASSED AWAY SUDDENLY ON WEDNESDAY, MARCH 21, 2018. BOB WAS A TALENTED MUSICIAN, A TEACHER, AND THE DIRECTOR OF CAMPS BACO AND CHE, NA, WAH IN THE ADIRONDACKS. HIS MUSIC, STORIES, JOKES, AND LOVE WILL STAY WITH ALL WHO KNEW HIM, AND HE WILL BE FOREVER MISSED. THE FUNERAL WILL BE HELD AT 12:00PM ON SUNDAY, MARCH 25 AT TEMPLE EMANUEL, 150 HICKS LANE, GREAT NECK, NY 11024. IN LIEU OF FLOWERS, DONATIONS IN HIS MEMORY MAY BE MADE TO HISTIOCYTOSIS ASSOCIATION, 332 NORTH BROADWAY, PITMAN, NJ 08071. 1

Headline.Para: Paid Notice: Memorials; WORTMAN, ROBERT ("BOB") BELOVED HUSBAND OF BARBARA, FATHER OF MELISSA (JOE) AND ALLISON, GRANDFATHER OF HAZEL, SON OF RUTH AND THE LATE MELVIN, SON, IN, LAW OF HARRIET AND THE LATE HERB, BROTHER OF JERRY (LAURIE) AND ANITA, AND BROTHER, IN, LAW OF SUSAN PASSED AWAY SUDDENLY ON WEDNESDAY, MARCH 21, 2018. BOB WAS A TALENTED MUSICIAN, A TEACHER, AND THE DIRECTOR OF CAMPS BACO AND CHE, NA, WAH IN THE ADIRONDACKS. HIS MUSIC, STORIES, JOKES, AND LOVE WILL STAY WITH ALL WHO KNEW HIM, AND HE WILL BE FOREVER MISSED. THE FUNERAL WILL BE HELD AT 12:00PM ON SUNDAY, MARCH 25 AT TEMPLE EMANUEL, 150 HICKS LANE, GREAT NECK, NY 11024. IN LIEU OF FLOWERS, DONATIONS IN HIS MEMORY MAY BE MADE TO HISTIOCYTOSIS ASSOCIATION, 332 NORTH BROADWAY, PITMAN, NJ 08071. 1

LeadPara.Para: WORTMAN--Robert ("Bob") Beloved husband of Barbara, father of Melissa (Joe) and Allison, grandfather of Hazel, son of Ruth and the late Melvin, son-in-law of Harriet and the late Herb, brother of Jerry (Laurie) and Anita, and brother-in-law of Susan passed away suddenly on Wednesday, March 21, 2018. Bob was a talented musician, a teacher, and the Director of Camps Baco and Che-na-wah in the Adirondacks. His music, stories, jokes, and love will stay with all who knew him, and he will be forever missed. The funeral will be held at 12:00pm on Sunday, March 25 at Temple Emanuel, 150 Hicks Lane, Great Neck, NY 11024. In lieu of flowers, donations in his memory may be made to Histiocytosis Association, 332 North Broadway, Pitman, NJ 08071. 1
